attributes.review: It’s so weird but as soon as I opened the app a large, scary, orange-looking man appeared and asked for my complete devotion. 🔥🔥🔥🔥No! Way! 🙅‍♀️🙅‍♀️🙅‍♀️🙅‍♀️ Say no to the Cheeto cult! I belong to Jesus Christ not some Oompa Loompa-looking racist. ✨✨✨✨✨✨✨✨ plus the glitches are outrageous. 🤷🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️✨
attributes.title: Seriously?

attributes.review: I downloaded this app, but immediately, it hacked my phone. My keyboard doesn’t work anymore and I can only use voice type!!!!!!!!!! Very unsatisfied!!!!!!!

My boyfriends sisters best friends moms cousin uncles dad is actually the king of Antarctica. He lived under the snow for forty seven years after hearing that trump was elected and then was elected the leader of the country. Trump can burn in hell🥰🥺😍🧚🏻💫 he keeps Immigrant children in cages🤩🥰🥵😍👑🥺

there is a picture of some scary orange dude with a comb over as soon as you open the app. i actually had nightmares about how scary he is. he looks like a racist, homophobic, xenophobic, misogynistic, piece of trash.
attributes.title: WORST APP

attributes.review: no❤️ just a horrible app, my phone was acting so crazy after downloading this...i have to get a whole new phone
attributes.title: UGH🤬

attributes.review: Absolutely horrible. Always crashes. Always telling me fake news. Horrendous. Absolutely horrendous. Fake news!! We will not allow it!!
attributes.title: Horrendous!!

attributes.review: I would rate it zero stars but that wasn’t an option 😌 anyways this app is putrid 🤩this all is slow and isn’t helpful at all 😚

attributes.review: I downloaded it to keep up with the campaign but it kept on sending me McDonald’s hamburger coupons. Imagine my horror seeing hamburgers and chicken nuggets all over my screen . I’M A VEGAN!!!
attributes.title: This app is HORRIBLE!!!

attributes.review: This app does not provide an informative news. I recommend a much more reliable news source app called TikTok
attributes.title: This app is terrible

attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded the app my phone started to glitch out. Really disappointed.
attributes.title: Worst app such a disappointment
